name: FMouseInputDeviceState
doc: Current State of a physical Mouse device at a point in time.

Left: State of the left mouse button
Middle: State of the middle mouse button
Right: State of the right mouse button
WheelDelta: Change in 'ticks' of the mouse wheel since last state event
Position2D: Current 2D position of the mouse, in application-defined coordinate system
Delta2D: Change in 2D mouse position from last state event
WorldRay: Ray into current 3D scene at current 2D mouse position
